title: HedgeFx
author: HedgeFx
content: For a long time I believed that Theymos was the user who joined the forum first, but his profile shows that he joined in 2010 and he is still active.The same thing goes for satoshi (joined in 2010) but in not active since a long time.Seems that Sirius (https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=4 ) joined forum in 2009, and he is still active! Are there any other old users who are still active?

comments.author: Z-tight
comments.body: Move this topic to meta, it is not about BTC, so it should not be in BTC discussionQuote from: HedgeFx on April 06, 2023, 12:57:44 PMSeems that Sirius (https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=4 ) joined forum in 2009, and he is still active! Sirius' last post on the forum was in 2014, so he isn't active, he was one of the creators of this forum, but i do not know if he still has some control over it now. From his last seen, you'll know he still comes to the forum to maybe read posts, but not active anymore to make posts, and there are many old members like that.

comments.author: Little Mouse
comments.body: BitcoinFX- https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=30Quote from: Z-tight on April 06, 2023, 01:11:38 PM but i do not know if he still has some control over it now. Sirius was admin till 2012 and later theymos took it over. As far as I know, Sirius don't have access to anything now. Cobra used to have access to bitcointalk but now, bitcointalk is totally owned by theymos while Cobra has access in bitcoin.orgQuote from: Cantsay on April 06, 2023, 01:19:23 PMQuote from: Little Mouse on April 06, 2023, 01:18:17 PMBitcoinFX- https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=30Last post: July 23, 2022It doesn't mean he doesn't browse the forum.

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: Quote from: Little Mouse on April 06, 2023, 01:18:17 PMBitcoinFX- https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=30Last post: July 23, 2022If were to consider any other users aside from those mention it will be;-Theymos:- https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=35

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: @OgNasty  has also been here since 2011 and have been active ever since then till now... Or 2011 users are not considered under the old members count ??

comments.author: tbct_mt2
comments.body: Oldest user is unclear. I am guessing what you want to ask.Do you want to find oldest user in their registration date and still be actively in forum?- It is BitcoinFX. The user engaged in the Pizza deal that makes us a Bitcoin Pizza day.Quote from: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=137.msg1183#msg1183laszlo I would offer to buy you a pizza, but I'm not based in the USA, so they might think I'm a prank caller.If you don't get any other offers I might look into how to go about buying you one online.Are you getting hungry or do you just like pizza ?¬† Do you want to find oldest user in real identity and still alive, still actively use the forum?- It is Jet Cash. 79 today and still going strong in 2021.

comments.author: Ever-young
comments.body: Quote from: tbct_mt2 on April 06, 2023, 01:43:17 PMOldest user is unclear. I am guessing what you want to ask.Do you want to find oldest user in their registration date and still be actively in forum?I believe what @HedgeFx means by the "older users" are the members who have actually been here for a long period of time, like from their registration dates (2009, 2010) till date, and not the one who is the oldest by age in this forum.¬†registration

comments.author: HedgeFx
comments.body: Yes, but happy to know Jet Cash (https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=698159) it 79¬†   Quote from: Ever-young on April 06, 2023, 02:02:38 PMQuote from: tbct_mt2 on April 06, 2023, 01:43:17 PMOldest user is unclear. I am guessing what you want to ask.Do you want to find oldest user in their registration date and still be actively in forum?I believe what @HedgeFx means by the "older users" are the members who have actually been here for a long period of time, like from their registration dates (2009, 2010) till date, and not the one who is the oldest by age in this forum.¬†registration

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: Quote from: Little Mouse on April 06, 2023, 01:18:17 PMBitcoinFX- https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=30Inaccurate information.  There is a senior member, who is: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=27QuoteName: ¬†¬†¬†riXPosition: ¬†¬†¬†Sr. MemberDate Registered: ¬†¬†¬†January 20, 2010, 01:58:48 PMLast Active: ¬†¬†¬†February 09, 2023, 09:00:21 AMBut the definition of the word "active" will determine whether it has been active in the last 10 years, 5 years, or 2 years.What will we gain from such topics? What would you do if you found out who he was? Are you going to send him a private message or what?

comments.author: HedgeFx
comments.body: Yes, active what does it means? My point of view of "active" means that user continues to interact with the community, posting content, and that his last post must not be older than a month.Quote from: Husires on April 06, 2023, 02:15:01 PMBut the definition of the word "active" will determine whether it has been active in the last 10 years, 5 years, or 2 years.What will we gain from such topics? What would you do if you found out who he was? Are you going to send him a private message or what?

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: Quote from: HedgeFx on April 06, 2023, 02:20:24 PMYes, active what does it means? You got your answer, although there is no point in knowing such accounts, on the contrary, it may lead to spamming them from other members.Just play with https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u= and will git full list

comments.author: acroman08
comments.body: Quote from: HedgeFx on April 06, 2023, 02:20:24 PMYes, active what does it means? My point of view of "active" means that user continues to interact with the community, posting content, and that his last post must not be older than a month.if that is what you mean by active, then Theymos would be the oldest account that is active in the forum because while Sirius and BitcoinFX's "last active" date is shown as 2023, both of them haven't posted anything for a while now.

comments.author: Lida93
comments.body: Quote from: HedgeFx on April 06, 2023, 12:57:44 PMFor a long time I believed that Theymos was the user who joined the forum first, but his profile shows that he joined in 2010 and he is still active.The same thing goes for satoshi (joined in 2010) but in not active since a long time.Seems that Sirius (https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=4 ) joined forum in 2009, and he is still active! Are there any other old users who are still active?¬†In my very opinion I will prefer to characterize oldest (older) members exclusively to those who have been in the forum for over a decade and more in the likes of @Theymos, @Welsh, @OgNasty and many other under this category. Many of these members may not be active anymore probably for the past one year or more but am sure the likes of Theymos, Welsh and OgNasty is pretty active till date.

comments.author: bitbollo
comments.body: you can check https://bpip.org/Report?r=mostactivity where you can find people with most activity that more or less are people with oldest account. also this rank allow to see a combination of users actually active/with highest activity.

comments.author: aoluain
comments.body: Quote from: Husires on April 06, 2023, 02:39:34 PMQuote from: HedgeFx on April 06, 2023, 02:20:24 PMYes, active what does it means? You got your answer, although there is no point in knowing such accounts, on the contrary, it may lead to spamming them from other members.Just play with https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u= and will git full listI checked the users before BitcoinFX who is #30, these are the 3 earliest members areare still active as per logins.#27 riX was active back in February and registered in January 2010 > https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=27#10 Xunie was active in August 2022 and registered December 9 2009 >https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=10#4 sirius was active on March 2 2023, registered November 20 2009 > https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=4

comments.author: nakamura12
comments.body: Are you planning on creating a list of Bitcointalk forum members who registered on 2009?. I don't see anyone who created a thread to list Bitcointalk forum members who are still active that registered on 2009. I see you are looking for forum members who registered on 2009 that are still posting till to this day instead of being online or Last Active when you checked their profile. Just do what lovesmayfamilis suggested and you will be in a witch hunt TBH.

comments.author: betnomi.com
comments.body: Quote from: Little Mouse on April 06, 2023, 01:18:17 PMBitcoinFX- https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=30I followed this link and was surprised that this guy is still active (I mean, it was active a couple of months ago).¬† I also re-read the bitcointalk history thread and remember this username as he organized a poker tournament that even the forum administrator participated in. Incredible!

comments.author: Sandra_hakeem
comments.body: Quote from: lovesmayfamilis on April 06, 2023, 01:25:36 PMYou can check profiles yourself.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=4https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=Uhmmm, I'm I getting this wrong? Cus I clicked on the second link and it took me to my own profile...but that ofcourse isn't a complete profile code...No?Secondly, I'm really surprised to have in my knowledge that Sirius was still active, even up till 2nd of last month... That's even more like the ecstasy I got when I saw VOD's profile too..(that's been a while though).I remember when i decided to take out time to see alot of old post from very active and reputable members who became uhhhh.. extinct after sometime... .¬† I realized there and then that very many peeps were tagged with a "heaped-book"üìö even before Achow was ..Sandra üßë‚Äçü¶∞

comments.author: God Of Thunder
comments.body: Quote from: HedgeFx on April 06, 2023, 02:11:52 PMYes, but happy to know Jet Cash (https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=698159) it 79¬†   The Thread is old. It was created in 2021. In Two months, He will be 81. He is still active, BTW.About Active oldest forum member. I consider the login date. So, It's Sirius, in my opinion. This is a mystery why he did not post anything after 2014. Who knows? Maybe Satoshi is hiding somewhere and laughing at us.
